Header: 59 Division Sergeant Major Saluted On the eve of His Retirement
Content: Warrant Officer 1 W.G.P Karunathilake of the 16 Sri Lanka Artillery (SLA) Regiment served as the 59 Division Sergeant Major recently bade a farewell to his military career during a ceremonial parade at the 59 Division Headquarters in Mullaittivu of the Security Force Headquarters â€“ Mullaittivu (SFHQ-MLT). Regimental Sergeant Majors of the under Command Brigades and battalions including a large gathering of Other Ranks serving under the 59 Division took part in the formal military ceremony.
